attributes.title: Upset
attributes.review: I was harrassed by the notifications on this app!! Absolutely disgusted by the spamming, I felt like I was following Trump on Twitter. Not to mention the fact that it asked me if Mt. Rushmore was a symbol of white supremacy which it absolutely is. The creators of this app should be ashamed of themselves! Karen out 🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Made me white 😫😫😫
attributes.review: I can’t believe it but when I downloaded this app all of the melanin left my body!!! I forgot how to speak Spanish and my parents are named Karen and Bob! HELP!!! I suspect that my real parents were murdered!!! How do I stop being Kelseigh?!? That’s not my name!!! 😭😭😫😫😫😫😖😖😩😩😩

attributes.title: Ewwww
attributes.review: This app is gross and so is the man behind it. If you have this then something is wrong. Delete immediately. Also started to cause a virus 🦠 on my phone and now it won’t charge so have to buy a new one. DONT BUY.

attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: This is a great app with real news and not fake news

attributes.title: Arrest the cops that killed breonna Taylor
attributes.review: If I could give ZERO STARS I would....this app is HORRID...the app was working fine until chettoh dust started SPEWING FROM MY PHONES CHARGING PORT... just when I thot the madness was over ....I realized that...  my phone started to MORPH INTO DONALD TRUMP...when I tell u I gagged... 0/10 wouldn’t recommend !!!!!
attributes.userName: hahah gen z rules the world

attributes.title: Big disappointment😢
attributes.review: I was talking to my fish bob before his walk outside and he told me to download it, and I was like oh ok. I’ll give it a try.. don’t download it👿it made me racist right my away. I saw my fish had some black spots and drowned him.

✨✨I downloaded the app trying to get quality news. As soon as I did, my phone got up and walked out of my hand. Then it sprinted down the street yelling, “I’M SUPPORTING A RACIST!” I couldn’t believe that the 🍊 would allow such things. 🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏿

attributes.title: ORANGE STALKER ALERT👀 🚨🚨🚨
attributes.review: It kept for my location and I felt like they was trying to stalk me 😰but I did it anyway 🤷‍♀️and the next day I got a package📦 and I opened the package and there was a letter✉️ and the letter said AND I QUOTE”IF YOU DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP 2020 YOU WONT SEE THE NEXT DAY👹” and I jus turned 18 and for my first vote it will not be trump🙃.PERIOD👁👄👁🧝‍♀️💕🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💓💗😻

attributes.title: Horrible! 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to support our president but the moment i opened it my entire nervous system failed. I am currently in the hospital and will be in a vegetated state for the rest of my life all due to this app 😖 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
